ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( FS_Site_Assessment_Required__c , 'Service Provider: Site Assessment Only (7000 Series Only)'), OR( $Profile.Name = 'FS Americhip PIC', $Profile.Name = 'FS CDM_P', $Profile.Name = 'FS COM_P', $Profile.Name = 'FS JCOM_P', $Profile.Name = 'FS NDO_P', $Profile.Name = 'FS Sales_P', $Profile.Name = 'FS Sales Leadership_P'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This is not a valid Site Assessment for your user
